attributes.action: Take action to ensure the use of correct method for the successful eradication of Sensecio jacobaea’ under the1959 Weeds Act .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The 1959 Weeds Act designated the weed ‘Sensecio jacobaea’ [Ragwort ] an injurious weed, any person, company, Council who has growing on their property this weed has a duty under that law to destroy it;  when one of  those responsible for so doing  makes an attempt, it is useless, for, instead of burning the weed, they leave it where if falls, so it continues to mature and broadcast its seeds, a  waste of time and money -your money, as a payer of ANY form of tax,  its your money that pays for the actions of  local and central government, and through the price that you pay as a consumer, you  pay for the useless attempts of producers.  
Ragwort is dangerous to all animals if ingested - including humans, it may be collected with crop; it attacks the liver, results are usually chronic, it may have acute effects and can be fatal to horses:  it has to do with the most toxic of pyrrelizidine alkaloids [cyclic diesters] causing vomiting, stomach pain and ataxia {loss of control over body movements, mainly the legs].
If you are NOT happy to have this dangerous weed proliferating, with no proper measures being taken for its eradication, then please sign this petition.
 Thank you
